TextView.android:text:
HappyShare is an application which is used to share some important, exciting, or valuable information with the people who are present in your zones.


You can share messages about topics like Traffic, Food & Drink, Events such as traffic jams, certain restaurant's specials, upcoming sport tournaments or concerts which are in your zone and you feel to share.


You can send & receive messages of the topics you like. If you don't like certain topics, you can unsubscribe them via the settings.
